author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The folks at Modiphius have been installing DOOM on CARDBOARD!

I was lucky enough to get my hands on a production prototype for DOOM: ARENA, a fast-play kitchen table battler where you can take control of the Legions of Hell. or DOOM GUY in a Best-Of-Three escalating engagement where you can go from Shotgun to BFG or DOOM GUY to CYBERDEMON on the table. Let's check it out. 

Thanks to Chris as the folks at Modiphius for the advance copy to get a first look at! 

GO check out all the new channels!

GMG Inside Tabletop
youtube.com/@GMGInsideTabletop

GMG Throwback Thursdays
youtube.com/@GMGThrowbackThursdays

GMG Games Workshop Games
youtube.com/@GMGGamesWorkshopGames

GMG Infinity x TacAware
youtube.com/@GMGInfinityxTacticalAwareness

Intro music 'Retrofuture Nasty' by Kevin McLeod
title: GMG First Look! - DOOM: Arena by Modiphius

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Crazy to think I've lived long enough for my kids to be able to hug a Space Marine as they fall asleep at night, but here we are. Need GRIMDARK Accessories for your bassinet? TOMY has you covered! 

Thanks to TOMY and GW for the complimentary selection of toys to review. 

#AdWIP

#TOMY

#WarhammerCommunity

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.gg/CCmeRy3

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

title: GMG Reviews - Warhammer Stuffies (?!?) by TOMY & Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The new DEAD SILENCE box set comes with two elite teams and a map-based Campaign System for Games Workshop's 40k Skirmish game. In this Part Three we're checking out the Wolf Scout Kill team!

Thanks to Games Workshop for the complimentary advance copy of the box to review.
